宷字的基本解释

宷
cài
古同“采”。

宷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shěn］
［《廣韻》式荏切，上寢，書。］
“宷1”的今字。“审1”的繁体字。
(1)详细；仔细。
(2)详究；细察。
(3)慎重。
(4)察知；知道。
(5)真实。
(6)明白；清楚。
(7)审问；审讯。
(8)指询问。
(9)审查；审核。
(10)古代计算羽毛的量词。犹束。
(11)通“瀋”。水深处。《庄子·应帝王》：“鯢桓之審爲淵，止水之審爲淵，流水之審爲淵。”一说，審当为“蟠”，又作“潘”。水回旋处。见陆德明释文。
(12)副词。确实，果真。
(13)姓。汉有审食其。见《史记·陈丞相世家》。

宷字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宷； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页287第01
【玉篇】古文審字。註詳十二畫。【說文】悉也，知宷禔也。从宀从釆。【徐曰】宀，覆也。釆，別也。包覆而深別之曰宷。篆作審，詳審字註。　【正字通】與寮寀之寀別。采，从爪从木。宷，从宀从釆。釆音便。辨同。會意。

宷
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shěn]
["Guangyun" style cut, go to bed, book. ]
The present word for "宷1". Traditional Chinese characters for "censor 1".
(1) Detailed; carefully.
(2) Detailed investigation; detailed investigation.
(3) Be cautious.
(4) Observe and know; know.
(5) Reality.
(6) Understand; be clear.
(7) Interrogation; interrogation.
(8) Refers to inquiry.
(9) Review; review.
(10) Ancient quantifiers for calculating feathers. Still beam.
(11) Through "Shen". Deep in the water. "Zhuangzi·Emperor Ying": "The trial of 鲵桓 is the abyss, the trial of still water is the abyss, and the trial of flowing water is the abyss." In one word, the trial is regarded as "pan" and also "pan". Water roundabout. See Lu Deming's explanation.
(12) Adverbs. Indeed, really.
(13) Last name. Han has tried to eat it. See "Historical Records · The Family of Prime Minister Chen".

[Jade articles] Examining ancient Chinese characters. Note the twelve paintings in detail. [Said the text] You know, you know you. Cong Luo Cong Xi. [Xu Yue] Luo, Fu Ye.釆, don't do it. Enveloping and deep separation is called 宷. The seal is for review, and the notes are reviewed in detail.　【Zhengzitong】The difference between Liaocai and Liaocai. Pick from the claw from the wood.宷，Cong 宀 Cong 釆. The sound will be. Distinguish the same. Knowing.
